name: Sailor Moon R Season 2: Women Must Be Strong and Beautiful: Rei's New Special Technique
short_description: Rei's grandfather is upset over the fact that Hikawa Shrine has had fewer female visitors lately. He then decides to retire as head priest to start a new business, which would allow him to be around young women, much to Rei's annoyance.
